TopicTitle: Any plans to add a Dv calculator?

Articles.Content: When playing KSP on my laptop, Kerbal Engineer is a must have mod. Any plans on adding a craft or stage Dv calculator to the craft editor?

People have been asking this since the dawn of times (at least the dawn of alpha), but even though it seems most players would want one, Squad stays on a "meh" position, saying it will be added sometime in the future.

The fact one can't add KER or MJ and so on on console might make things move a little. Might. A little.

[redacted, done]

Edited August 16, 2016 by Violent Jeb

On iOS there's an app called KSP DeltaV for around a dollar that lets you build rockets in stages from KSP parts that calculates TWR and DeltaV for the whole rocket and each stage, and the author keeps it up to date.  Great for designing rockets on the go, I never leave Kerbin without it.

not sure if it's on Android, though.
